Reviews.Title: “Oh my god...run!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Flat out scary terrible. Condemned signs on back of building. Used condoms on balcony. One of our friends slept in car to avoid sleeping in room. Bring your own sheets if you plan on staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Completely Disgusting”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We were forced to stay there because of Homecoming weekend. Everything about the hotel is disgusting. The "maintenence guy" walked around drinking a beer before the game, and when we returned, just as another guest noted, he ran up to us when we tried to enter our room and used his key to open it. He was clearly drunk. After calling every hotel in Champaign with no luck, we asked to switch rooms. The next room was somewhat better but we were still worried that there were bugs in our bed! The place should be torn down. If you have no other place to stay, I would suggest driving 40 miles to Decatur, or sleeping in your car.

Reviews.Title: “fit for the price”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I stayed for a couple of days , given the price and location I found the place a good bargain and they also have a lounge with live music on most weekends.The staff was helpful

Reviews.Title: “Good value for price”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We had a pleasant stay and the staff and service was very attentive. I would stay here again given the price.

Reviews.Title: “excellent experience?”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: hello, i recently was visiting champaign urbana and pulled into the premier inn off 74 and got a plesent staff to help me to my room the rooms were recently renovvated and had everything new in them including dvd players which had my kids attention and the beautiful dome area around the pool provided lots a enjoyment for the whole family, i would highly recommend this hotel to all my friends thanks again premier for a wonderful stay,,,

Reviews.Title: “Just plain awful!”
Reviews.Author: Maubstezuma
Reviews.Content: If this is the last hotel in Champaign with availability, stay outside of Champaign. Stayed here in May of 2004, as all of the other Champaign hotels were booked for graduation weekend. Rooms smelled moldy/mildewy. Whole place looks run down. Some rooms didn't have numbers posted. Fixtures have been painted over brass finish. Shower mat is caulked to the floor of the tub. Tub didn't drain very well at all. Stains on the carpet. Walls are painted-over wallpaper. Satellite dish on one of the exterior stairways, hooked up to nothing. Leave a deposit at the front desk if you'd like to have a phone in your room. Surprised they didn't have hourly rates. Believe me, we won't be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Think twice about staying here!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I had no choice but to stay there all the hotels was booked up for Mom's weekend. This hotel is first of all very unattactive, it looks rundown. The room I was in very cold, I turned the air off and put the tempature on 90 degrees and was still freezing in the room (I had to purchase blankets). The room was not the best maintained room. I was glad when the weekend was over so I could leave this dump.

Reviews.Title: “Every room is a sauna - all year around”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This place was the pits. Only the heat worked. Not enough fans to help. Attendent brought a 6 inch space heater to help with the heat and said "you can put it on fan only - ok". Worst hotel I ever "slept" in.

Reviews.Title: “Never Again”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This was by far the worst hotel I ever stayed in. At check in the room we originally had was terrible. The wallpaper was stained, dirty and pealing off the walls, there were holes in the walls and doors that had spackle slapped over them. The room was very dirty and had suspicious white stains on the carpet. The bathroom was completely stained a yellow color. We were forced to switched rooms since all other hotels were booked due to the Bears playing at U of I. The other room wasn't as bad but still next to terrible. The pool water wasn't anywhere next to clean or clear and the hallway floors were disgusting. Plus the staff was very rude. After coming back from the Bears game we found that are room key wasn't working anymore and the manager just came up and used his key to let us in our room. Once we were in we discovered that one of our credit cards were stollen. That isn't even all but by now you should deffinately know NOT to stay here.

HotelInfo.Name: Premier Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 1505 North Neil Street, Champaign, IL 61820 (Formerly Howard Johnson)
